@PT do u know of anything for windows?

Try this link which discusses adding soft subtitle in Windows:

http://blog.philgin.com/?p=14

It's rather easy on Mac.  Both Subler and iSubtitle work fine.  I tend to use iSubtitle more as it allows easy edit of Chapters.
